<title level="1" right="Rules">[Devastating Attacks](/Rules.aspx?ID=2745)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 4th level, your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal two damage dice instead of one. This increases to three at 12th level and to four at 19th level.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
